provided"}},"execute((uint8,address,address,uint256,bytes)[],uint256)":{"details":"this overloaded function is used when span parameters and sqrt roots are not needed to be checkedwhere there is no portfolio","params":{"_actions":"array of ActionArgs struct","_numZeroRoots":"the number of 0 value roots to provide in the form of bytes16[]"}},"executeSpanSim((uint8,address,address,uint256,bytes)[])":{"details":"this function should not be called directlyit has external visibility for the use of a delegatecall in decodes it","params":{"_actions":"array of ActionArgs struct"}},"getCurrentNormalizationFactor(address)":{"params":{"_perp":"perp address"},"returns":{"_0":"perp's norm factor","_1":"norm factor perp funding fee in perp decimals"}},"getPerpLastUpdateTimestampByVault(address,address)":{"params":{"_owner":"vault's owner","_perp":"perp's address"},"returns":{"_0":"timestamp of last update"}},"getPerpPriceInLiquidation(address)":{"details":"this price takes into account the liquidation penalty","params":{"_perp":"perp's address"},"returns":{"_0":"price used to value the debt in a contract","_shutdown":"address of the Shutdown contract","_spanMargin":"address of the SpanMargin contract","_vault":"address of the Vault contract"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the params._protocolNumeraireAsset: address of the numeraire that will be used in all perps deployed through this factory
params._protocolUnderlyingAsset: address of the asset that will be used in all perps deployed through this factory

execute((uint8,address,address,uint256,b.details: this overloaded function is used when span parameters and sqrt roots are needed to be provided for checking portfolio safety

params._spanParams: conservative span params that correspond to the _sqrtRoots provided
params._sqrtRoots: square root prices that are roots of the derivative of the portfolio value using _spanParams provided

execute((uint8,address,address,uint256,b.details: this overloaded function is used when span parameters and sqrt roots are not needed to be checkedwhere there is no need to check margin, the _numRoots used can be 0where zero roots or no need to check the value, the _numRoots used must match the expected number based on number of kinks in portfolio

params._numZeroRoots: the number of 0 value roots to provide in the form of bytes16[]

executeSpanSim((uint8,address,address,ui.details: this function should not be called directlyit has external visibility for the use of a delegatecall in simulateExecute()this function will revert and the revert message will have the vault span params as its datathis function is only meant to be called via simulateExecute() which handles the revert and decodes it

getFeeOnFunding(address,address,uint256,.details: this function allows users to estimate funding fees using a custom normalization factor

params._expectedNormFactor: the expected normalization factor to use in calculations
params._owner: the address of the vault owner
params._perp: the address of the perp token
params._perpAmount: the amount of perp tokens (negative for short positions)

returns._0: numeraireFeeInPerpDecimals the calculated numeraire funding fee in perp decimals
returns._1: perpFeeInPerpDecimals the calculated perp funding fee in perp decimals

getPerpPriceInLiquidation(address).details: this price takes into account the liquidation penalty

returns._0: price used to value the debt in a liquidation

getUnderlyingAssetPriceLookup(uint256).details: the _timestamp should be when a vault was updated, and the span margin of the vault was checked, otherwise stored price will be 0

init(address,address,address,address,add.details: can only be called once by the contract owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

simulateExecute((uint8,address,address,u.details: conservative span parameters have to be provided in execute(), and this is one way to generate themthis function will only work if approvals and balances are correct for the caller as it simulates the transaction including all calls to external contractsthis function can be called via a contract or for a front end / off chain use casethis function will bubble up revert messages for debugging

returns._0: the span parameters for the vault after all actions are completed

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._isActive: if true, set to operator, to unset, pass false

execute((uint8,address,address,uint256,b.notice: execute an array of actions on specific vault
execute an array of actions on specific vault

executeSpanSim((uint8,address,address,ui.notice: execute a span simulation on a series of actions and revert with the span params encoded in the revert message

getCurrentNormalizationFactor(address).notice: get the current norm factor for a specific perp address

getFeeOnFunding(address,address,uint256,.notice: calculate the funding fee for a given perp position

getPerpLastUpdateTimestampByVault(addres.notice: get the last timestamp where a perp amount is updated in a vault

getPerpPriceInLiquidation(address).notice: get the price of a perp used to value the debt when liquidating a short perp position

getUnderlyingAssetPriceLookup(uint256).notice: get stored underlying asset price at specific timestamp

init(address,address,address,address,add.notice: secondary initialization function to set necessary addresses and initialize VaultManager and SpanMargin

setFeeOnFunding(address,uint256).notice: set fee on powerperp's fundingcan only be called by owner

setFeeOnLiquidation(address,uint256).notice: set fee on powerperp's liquidationcan onyl be called by owner

setFeeOnShortPowerPerp(address,uint256).notice: set fee on minting specific power perpcan only be called by owner

setLiquidationPenaltyInFunding(address,u.notice: set perp's funding rate for liquidation penaltycan only be called by owner

setLiquidationPenaltyInVol(address,int25.notice: set perp's vol for liquidation penaltycan only be called by owner

simulateExecute((uint8,address,address,u.notice: function to be called to simulate a series of actions and return the span params for the vault after all actions completed
